title: "AI robot 'coach' helps curling athletes training in NE China"
excerpt: "A robot that uses artificial intelligence (AI), image recognition, automatic control and other technologies has been adopted in the city of Harbin, northeast China's Heilongjiang Province, to help with the training of curling athletes for the upcoming Beijing 2022 Olympic Winter Games."
